source_paper: Eftimoski et al. (2017) - Ordered logit model to assess burial mound vulnerability to human activity in Kazanlak Valley, Bulgaria

overall_summary.assessment_scope: Complete verification of all extracted items and relationships
overall_summary.overall_assessment: Perfect extraction quality across all dimensions - accuracy, granularity, and mapping integrity

pass_a_accuracy_detailed.summary: Overall accuracy 100.0% - Perfect performance across all item types
key_findings: Perfect accuracy across all item types - no hallucinations, misattributions, or categorisation errors
Excellent categorisation: Evidence (evidence_type, evidence_basis), Claims (empirical vs interpretation vs methodological_argument), RDMAP (method_type, protocol_type, design_type)
All verbatim quotes accurate and verified
Complex extractions well-documented with extraction_notes (E024, E025 calculations)
Interpretive signals correctly identified: 'likely', 'probably', 'suggests', 'may', 'could' consistently trigger interpretation categorisation
Conditional reasoning ('If...then') appropriately categorised as interpretation
Null results appropriately categorised as empirical findings
RDMAP hierarchy complete and correct with clear abstraction levels
Declared uncertainties appropriately captured (statistical P-values, approximations 'ca.')
Implicit protocols (IP001-IP003) excellently identified with strong inference_reasoning and comprehensive expected_information_missing documentation

pass_b_granularity_detailed.summary: Overall granularity 100.0% - Perfect editorial judgment on consolidation and atomicity

notable_consolidations: E007: Comparative erosion rates (high >0.40 + typical 0.17-0.22 mm/year)
E011: Complete dataset description (8+ elements consolidated)
E014-E015: Land-use distribution statistics (pasture vs agriculture)
E019: Height distribution parameters (range, mean, median)
E024: Pasture→agriculture simulation with multi-part calculations
E025: Urban boundary retreat simulation with calculations

notable_patterns: Compound claims appropriately split (C002/C003 from same abstract sentence)
Related but distinct claims appropriately separated (C026/C027, C043/C044/C045)
Direction and magnitude appropriately separated (C058/C059, C060/C061, C062/C063)
Appropriate consolidations: C006 (prediction + resource allocation), C007 (three contrasts), C022 (ploughing + harrowing)

key_findings: Perfect granularity across all item types
Excellent consolidation judgment: Complex data (E024-E025) consolidated with explanatory notes, related measurements appropriately grouped
Appropriate atomic separations: Distinct observations (E003/E004), distinct coefficients (E026/E027, E028/E029), distinct factors (C002/C003)

Consistent abstraction levels: Evidence (measurement/observation), Claims (assertion/interpretation), Methods (high-level approach), Protocols (implementation procedures), Designs (overarching frameworks)
RDMAP hierarchy clear with appropriate detail progression: Designs (2) → Methods (4) → Protocols (10)
No over-splitting: No unnecessarily fragmented items
No under-splitting: No inappropriately combined assertions
No inconsistencies: Detail levels appropriate throughout

pass_c_mapping_detailed.summary: Overall mapping quality 100.0% - Perfect relationship integrity across all mapping types

notable_examples: C017 → E002+E003+E004: Triangulated endangerment evidence (excavation data + inventory observations)
C028 → E007+E008: Multi-faceted support (low erosion + small mounds survive)
C041 → E014+E015+E016: Comprehensive land-use distribution evidence
C058 → E024+E028: Simulation result + coefficient support
Quantitative claims precisely matched to quantitative evidence (C059→E024, C061→E025)

structural_notes: Hierarchical structure clear: Core claims ← Intermediate claims ← Supporting claims
Logical flow appropriate: General claims (C011) precede specific claims (C012, C013)
Mechanism claims support pattern claims: C004→C002 (ploughing mechanism), C005→C003 (looting mechanism)
Interpretation chains logical: C010←C014 (depopulation threat elaborated)

method_to_design.notes: M001 has dual design_context (RD001, RD002) but primarily implements RD002; context vs implementation distinction appropriate

protocol_to_method.notes: Complete protocol coverage for each method; Implicit protocols (IP001-IP003) appropriately linked to M002

key_findings: Perfect mapping quality across all relationship types (146 mappings verified)
Claim→Evidence: All evidence directly supports claims, multi-evidence triangulation appropriate
Claim→Claim: Hierarchical structure clear, logical flow appropriate, mechanism claims support pattern claims
Method→Design: All methods appropriately implement designs, dual-design context handled appropriately
Protocol→Method: All protocols appropriately implement methods, complete protocol coverage
RDMAP hierarchy complete: RD001 → M002,M003,M004 → P002-P007,IP001-IP003; RD002 → M001 → P001
No weak or incorrect mappings identified
